title: kAmAkSi (amba) bangAru
sahitya:
kAmAkSi (amba) bangAru kAmAkSi nanu brOvavE 


anupallavi

  tAmasamEla rAvE sAmagAna lOlE sushIlE
				(svara)
pA , ; dha pa ma ga ri gA mA dhA , nI dha ma ga ri sa ga ri gA ma pA , ma dha ni 
gA* ri* gA* sa* ri* ni sA* ni dha pa ma pa pA ma gA ri gA , gA* ri* sa* ni dha pa ma ga ga ri ri sa sA  


caraNam 1    kAmakAla priya bhAmini kAmya kAmadE kalyANI kAmAkSi kancadaLAyatAkSi trikONa vAsini kAruNya rUpiNi
    caraNam 2    pAvanI mrdu bhASiNI bhakta pAlinI bhavamOcanI hEmAngi himagiri putrI mahEshvarI hrImkAra rUpiNI
    caraNam 3    shyAmakrSNa paripAlini shuka shyAmaLE shivashankarI shUlinI sadAshivuniki rANI vishAlAkSa taruNI shAshvata rUpiNI
				(svarasAhiyta)
nA manavini vinu dEvI nIvE gatiyani namminAnu mAyammA vEgamE karuNajUDavammA bangAru bommA
